Generation IX.Scarlet: Armarouge evolved through the use of a set of armor that belonged to a distinguished warrior. This Pokémon is incredibly loyal.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon clads itself in armor that has been fortified by psychic and fire energy, and it shoots blazing fireballs.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area Two Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ , 6★ )
Generation IX.Violet: Union Circle Tera Raid Battle Search ( 5★ , 6★ , Poké Portal News )
